title: Lakshmi Kasu Haram Pendant with Golden South Sea Pearl
materials: Golden South Sea Pearl. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a rich
features: This exquisite pendant showcases the revered Goddess Lakshmi in intricate detail, rendered in the classic Temple Jewellery style with Nakshi work (నక్షి పని). The diamond-studded floral pattern adds a contemporary touch. It features a single, lustrous Golden South Sea pearl, suspended delicately, creating a mesmerizing focal point.
colors: Predominantly gold with shimmering white diamonds and a warm
golden hue from the South Sea Pearl.
occasions: Bharatanatyam). A significant piece for celebrating auspicious moments.
description: This Lakshmi Kasu Haram pendant is not just jewelry; it's a symbol of prosperity and divine grace. The combination of traditional Nakshi craftsmanship with modern diamond accents makes it a timeless treasure. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures enduring beauty and a rich, luxurious feel. A rare Golden South Sea pearl enhances its elegance and desirability.
